name: VTECRM
summary: European professional CRM web and mobile open source
short_description:
VTECRM is the open source CRM-system with an SDK dedicated to the needs of service companies and industry. It is supported by a certified network of developers, project managers and analysts in many countries in the world. Many big companies have already chosen VTECRM.
It includes a calendar, a multi-account webmail function, an internal chat and an APP for iOS and Android with also Calendar and Email. It has all the possibilities that the modern market of CRM application demands like xRM, mobile CRM and social CRM. And for those who want the System as a cloud service: This is possible too, for a fee of 12â‚¬ per user/month.
